previous.excerpt:
The streaming industry is getting a lot of exposure lately with all the news
from Disney+ and HBO max. Looking for a pure play in the streaming service I
came across CuriosityStream. Basically the platform offers documentaries about
science, history, politics, etc... and they have over 3000+ titles…
